author: janne
msg: Replace the GPL licensed diff util with a Apache licensed one.

author: jonl
msg: Added interpolate abstract method to TextTemplate to support a shared resource factory and link class.  Added a TextTemplateSharedResourceFactory class which makes it very easy to create unique shared resource references for various interpolations of a template.  Also added a link class that uses the factory to create links to resources generated by the factory.

author: jonl
msg: Added illegal state exception when attempting to interpolate a non-existent variable.  This is much better than the existing NPE with no explanation of what variable was missing.

author: ehillenius
msg: deprecated methods instead of removing them
